text: Erna Solberg (; born 24 February 1961) is a Norwegian politician. She has been leader of the Conservative Party since 2004. She was the 35th Prime Minister of Norway from 2013 until 2021. Solberg lost her re-election in September 2021, after the Conservative party lost many seats in the election. Solberg is the leader of the Conservative Party [as of 2024's first quarter].https://www.nrk.no/norge/solberg-saken_-_-blir-mer-alvorlig-for-hver- dag-som-gar-1.16604076. Retrieved 2023-10-21 As of the end of February 2024, two political parties have Solberg as the main candidate to lead a coalition of parties after the elections (for parliament) in 2025. The parties are KrF and the Conservative Party. ==Controversy== ===2024 criticism (against Solberg) by kontrollkomiteen, a committee of parliament=== On November 7, 2023, she gave answers to questions during a hearing by parliament's Standing Committee on Scrutiny and Constitutional Affairs.https://www.nettavisen.no/norsk-debatt/horingen-erna-med-balansekunst- pa-tynn-is/o/5-95-1439062. Retrieved 2024-03-05 ==Family== Solberg was born in Bergen.
